text:
I am looking to publish Deal Record data on technically unprotected publicly accessible pages.

We have a “partner portal” that uses email authentication to allow partners to “log in” and view their landing page if we’ve set them up. In the portal they submit leads that generate deals and we take it from there. I would love for them to see the status of those deals there on their landing page.

Is there any way around record information only being publishable on password protected pages?
